title: Big mouths on peoples for sale threads

posts.content: If you dont want to buy it, what is the need to comment on the sale?

totallly agree 100%..............
i find it highly offensive that fellow enthusiasts feel they have the right to ramdomly attack someones for sale thread!!
if you dont like it-- dont read it!! easy.
considering given these people wouldnt say boo to a goose at a meeting or show!!!!

I totally agree with you all.

If you dont want to buy it, dont buy it.....dont tell everyone else your thoughts thus reducing the amount of opportunities available for the vendor.

I work in an industry where everyone is an expert so I deal with these sorts of people on a daily basis. I regularly hear..' I can get that cheaper down the road or you need to reduce the price of that to sell that'

All of these excuses (and lets face it thats what they are) are resons that people give themselves for not buying......they really have no intention in the 1st place. We call these people PLW (Potential Lottery Winners)

IE. If I won the lottery I would buy that...........

Rant over!

g4rfy wrote:


I work in an industry where everyone is an expert so I deal with these sorts of people on a daily basis.




Sounds like the motor trade.

Oh yes!

And I have experienced it first hand on the IOW too!

G4

Worked on the IOW for 3 years at Snows / HGL / Kings not sure what it is called now.

I lived in Shanklin and left the Island on 2004. Since then I have worked for Sytner.........now in Portsmouth.

Loved the IOW.......just couldnt stay....if you know what I mean.

Have some good friends on the Island.

G
i lived in ryde 1986-1988

Snows BMW, Gareth? sales manager?


Nothing to do with a gobby welsh bird?








Oh crap, just realised I have totally hijacked a thread about people hijacking other peoples threads.

Sorry bro`

I think it may be the club 80 90 forum or one of the syncro forums where there are no replies allowed on for sale ads. The forum rules state no replies to for sale ad's. You just e-mail or phone the seller. Its so refreshing to just see things for sale without having to wade through all the s*!t that goes with it on a lot of forums. I find VZI is particularly bad for that with plenty of pointless remarks like 'if i had the money i would buy that' like we all need to read that time after time..

Wouldn't be a bad idea for this forum after all there's plenty of other places to put out your opinion other than tagging it onto someone elses thread.

100% agreed graham!!!
nice bus?
dont do it?
why?
all of the above and others should be banned!
but on the other side comments bump the post up to the top!!
you lot are allways pointless bitching
